lines.text: Talking to you would be a waste of my breath, David.
Continue to talk to me, waste your breath, because if you waste your breath, you just might drop dead.
I'm really sorry about your father Jen.
Uh. Look if you came here to pray, I'm not interested.
Everything's going to be fine, guys. Just - just do what he says.
How can you be so calm?
I don't know if I am calm, okay? I just - I've been through worse.
Yeah? Like what?
Oh, like being strapped to a table and your grandfather ready to cut your heart out.
Oh. Yeah, you got me beat, then. Never mind.
What would you call that, Jessica?
Doing what I have to do. Mitch has hurt my family in every way possible and I want to make sure that not only does he pay, that he never hurts my family again.
Oh yeah? Well, not tonight you're not.

I don't know, something twisted. I mean, this whole place is twisted. It's like some twisted shrine of him and mother. What'd you do down here, gramps? Count your money and stare at yourself while groping at your daughter? Bastard!
Do you know what an evil, lying tramp Shawna is?
Yeah. That's why I like her.
All my life, Al, nobody has even been attracted to me.
Well, listen, those days are over, Marcie.
[Viki and Dorian imagine themselves as each other. In Viki's dream of her life as Dorian, Kelly and Blair end up in a catfight and Starr interrupts the melee]
My anaconda's eating Jack! What do I do?
[In Dorian's dream of her life as Viki, Kevin inquires about his "mummy's" life]
Mother, what brings you here?
I've lost my beloved Llanfair... again.
Again? What happened? Was it fire? Did Mitch Laurence come back from the dead? Did Victor Lord come back from the dead? Did someone come back from the dead?
Today is not a good day to be pushing my buttons.
Well, what about tomorrow?
Tomorrow doesn't look good either.

[after shooting Todd in the legs twice]
Stop making me shoot you!

[to Dorian]
Grandma, you are wicked cool!
River, please, the 'G' word
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text: Sorry... Dorian
David, could you please, please leave us alone? Thank you.
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text: By all means.
And, David dear, would you close the doors behind you?
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text: Yeah, not your butler.
Right.
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text: I've got to meet the Chief of Staff of the hospital. He wants to talk to me about a position there. You know what this means?
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text: Free tetanus shots?
Honestly, I wasn't with another man, I swear.
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text: You swear on what?
I swear on my desk, on the family pictures, on the statue, on
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text: [sees a silver candlestick poking out of David's bag]
... My candlestick in your luggage?
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text:
[fake surprise]
What's your candlestick doing in my luggage?
Nevermind.
lines.character: Dr. Dorian Cramer Lord Callison Santi Vickers Hayes Laurence #3

lines.text: Must be nice living in a world of newspapers; all your people in black and white.

[disguised as Blair]
I'm not Peggy! I'm Blair Cramer Buchanan Manning Holden... did I forget a Manning in there? Oh well. Doesn't matter.

[getting blamed for not realizing Mark was gay]
Don't look at me. How was I supposed to know? He wasn't wearing a baseball hat that said "gay" on it.

[Bo is taking some policemen to try to find Blair]
All right, now, let's go.
Bo, don't neglect to turn on your lights and your siren. I will be right behind.
Ugh.
This is a seminal moment for me. I'll be chasing a police car instead of it chasing me. Let's go.
Oh, Clint, I forgot to tell you... Jessie's pregnant.
Who's the father?
We don't know. We don't even know who the mother is.

So... my brother, the police detective, wants his brother, the doctor, to perform an autopsy. An illegal autopsy. Off the record, with *no* permission at all, and, *and* against every possible legal and ethical rule in *both* our professions. This is it, huh? This is how it happens, right? This is how the McBain boys go right down the tube.
We could always enroll in that truck-driving school.

[talking about Tommy]
We didn't do anything... except find out and not tell anyone about him being a kidnapped baby. That would make us accessories.
I don't like that word, accessory.
I thought you loved it. With your furry vest and fuzzy hat.
Do you happen to have a room available?
Mmm... no.
What if the president showed up?

[skeptically]
This president?
Eisenhower.
Oh him. Oh, yeah, well I think I could find a room for him.
Okay well he's not going to show up, so I'll take his room.
No you won't.
Look, Roxy, c'mon I'm desperate. Don't you even have a broom closet? Only much larger with a king size bed and a view of something that's not a crime scene.
Looks like the media found their angle - John McBain is Batman.
